ca.etsmtl.log430.lab1
Class Menus

java.lang.Object
  ca.etsmtl.log430.lab1.Menus

public class Menus
extends java.lang.Object

This class presents the user with menus, accepts their choice, ensures their choice is valid, and returns their choice to the caller. The menu is presented as follows: 

    1) List resources
    2) List projects
    3) List projects currently assigned to a resource
    4) List resources currently assigned to a project
    5) Assign a resource to a project
    X) Exit.

Version:
1.5, 2013-Sep-13.
Author:
A.J. Lattanze, CMU
